bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names zhang ci 脹刺 , distension with [a feeling of] having been pierced. Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of distension as if having been hit or stabbed. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry chu 楮 quotes Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 : 天行病後脹滿：兩脅刺脹，臍下如水腫， 以構樹枝汁，隨意服之。小便利即消 , “Distension and a feeling of fullness following disease sent by heaven: piercing distension in both flanks, below the navel this looks like an edema. Take the juice from the leaves of gou shu and ingest them at will. Once urination is stimulated [the distension] will be eliminated”.
